title: Sarnówek Mały
text:
Sarnówek Mały is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Bodzech%C3%B3w">Gmina Bodzechów</a>, within <a href="Ostrowiec%20County">Ostrowiec County</a>, <a href="%C5%9Awi%C4%99tokrzyskie%20Voivodeship">Świętokrzyskie Voivodeship</a>, in south-central Poland. It lies approximately north of <a href="Ostrowiec%20%C5%9Awi%C4%99tokrzyski">Ostrowiec Świętokrzyski</a> and east of the regional capital <a href="Kielce">Kielce</a>.
The village has a population of 30.
References.
